argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer to the loaded toolbar.

argument.name: toolbarname
argument.description: The name of a previously created toolbar.

page.description: Returns the definition of a toolbar. Dialog body, init, event and title strings are returned
page.discussion: The A5_TOOLBAR_DEF_LOAD() function loads a previously created toolbar.
page.example: dim vl as P dim tbar as P vl = local_variables() tbar = a5_toolbar_def_load("Invoice") a5_system_toolbar_show(vl,tbar) ? properties_enum(tbar) = dlg_title pre_toolbar_init dlg_horizontal dlg_vertical dlg_float event_code ? tbar.dlg_title = "Form View"

see.ref: How to Design a Custom Toolbar
